mapper.select: SELECT maker_id, maker_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active FROM MASTER_MAKER ORDER BY maker_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MASTER_MAKER (maker_name, contact_info, address, phone_number, email, is_active) VALUES (#{makerName}, #{contactInfo}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{email}, #{isActive})
mapper.update: UPDATE MASTER_MAKER SET maker_name = #{makerName}, contact_info = #{contactInfo}, address = #{address}, phone_number = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email}, is_active = #{isActive} WHERE maker_id = #{makerId}
